channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress Filter Gallery Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress Filter Gallery Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-4142|2024-08-03T01:27:54.543Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20filter%20gallery%20plugin
item.description: The WordPress Filter Gallery Plugin WordPress plugin before 0.1.6 does not properly escape the filters passed in the ufg_gallery_filters ajax action before outputting them on the page, allowing a high privileged user such as an administrator to inject HTML or javascript to the plugin settings page, even when the unfiltered_html capability is disabled.
